B

bind(RECOServiceConnectListener) - Method in class com.perples.recosdk.RECOBeaconManager
Connect the instance of the RECOBeaconManager to com.perples.recosdk.RECOBeaconService
When the connection to com.perples.recosdk.RECOBeaconService is established, onServiceConnect() is called.

getInstance(Context, boolean) - Static method in class com.perples.recosdk.RECOBeaconManager
Deprecated.
As of release 0.2, replaced by RECOBeaconManager.getInstance(Context) or RECOBeaconManager.getInstance(Context, boolean, boolean)

0.2 버전 부터, RECOBeaconManager.getInstance(Context) 혹은 RECOBeaconManager.getInstance(Context, boolean, boolean)로 대체.

RECOBeacon - Class in com.perples.recosdk
The RECOBeacon class represents a beacon that was encountered during region monitoring or region ranging.
RECOBeaconManager - Class in com.perples.recosdk
The RECOBeaconManager class provides interfaces handling RECOBeacon-related events.
RECOBeaconRegion - Class in com.perples.recosdk
The RECOBeaconRegion class defines a type of region based on the device's proximity to a beacon.
RECOBeaconRegion(String, String) - Constructor for class com.perples.recosdk.RECOBeaconRegion
Create and return a region object that targets a beacon with the given proximity uuid.
RECOBeaconRegion(String, Integer, String) - Constructor for class com.perples.recosdk.RECOBeaconRegion
Create and return a region object that targets a beacon with the given proximity uuid and major value.
RECOBeaconRegion(String, Integer, Integer, String) - Constructor for class com.perples.recosdk.RECOBeaconRegion
Create and return a region object that targets a beacon with the given proximity uuid, major value and minor value.
RECOErrorCode - Enum in com.perples.recosdk
RECOServiceConnectListener, RECOMonitoringListener and RECORangingListener interface classes use RECOErrorCode.
RECOMonitoringListener - Interface in com.perples.recosdk
The RECOMonitoringListener interface receives the results when startMonitoringForRegion method is called.
RECOProximity - Enum in com.perples.recosdk
The RECOProximity represents the relative distance to a RECOBeacon.
RECORangingListener - Interface in com.perples.recosdk
The RECORangingListener interface receives the results when startRangingBeaconsInRegion method is called.
RECOServiceConnectListener - Interface in com.perples.recosdk
The RECOServiceConnectListener interface receives the results when bind method is called.
requestStateForRegion(RECOBeaconRegion) - Method in class com.perples.recosdk.RECOBeaconManager
request state for given region.
